fields.name: Access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal
fields.description: Access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal
fields.subject: Access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal
fields.content:
Dear user,

You have been granted access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal.

Please registry here and feel free to login in the system, username is your e-mail address provided at the time of account registration.

Thank you.
fields.html_content:
Dear user,

You have been granted access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal.

Please registry here and feel free to login in the system, username is your e-mail address provided at the time of account registration.

Thank you.

fields.name: access_grant_email
fields.description: Access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal
fields.subject: Access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal
fields.content:
Dear {{ instance.first_name }},

You have been granted access to UNICEF Donor Reporting Portal.

Please registry at {{home_link}} and feel free to login in the system, username is your e-mail address provided at the time of account registration.

Thank you.

Please registry here

and feel free to login in the system, username is your e-mail address provided at the time of account registration.

Thank you.
